name: Out Of Guntrol
description:
Your weapon is out of control and wont stop firing! You must try to navigate through the levels while holding onto it.

Controls: You only need your mouse and no clicking needed!

Sadly the WebGL build has an issue with the weapon sound.

The game was created as a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 and made with Unity 2019.4. The 3D models were created with blender and the sound effects with Bfxr.

Only non selfmade asset that was used is the font: https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Boston-Traffic

I hope you enjoyed this small game! :)
